title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 203.1 - Applicability of Vehicle and Traffic Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 203.1 - Applicability of Vehicle and Traffic Law

State Regulations
(a) Except for those provisions which are
inconsistent with or modified by these rules and regulations, the provisions of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law of the State of New York, chapter 775 of the Laws
of 1959 as amended, shall apply to the authority facilities. (b) The omission of a prohibited act
previously referred to or listed in the previous rules and regulations of the
authority shall not mean that the authority gives its consent to such an act if
such an act is prohibited by the Vehicle and Traffic Law of the State of New

York or any other chapter of the laws of the State of New

York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
203.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
